message.body: Oh Jenny. We just got done eating and are about to walk back home. We are so so stuffed and tired and don't really feel like going back out. We're lazy bums right now. Do you mind if we just see everyone on Monday? And if anything changes you can still come out to dinner with us tomorrow night.
Oh yeah!!! Not a problem! I probably won't be able to go out tomorrow because of the movies and then we're making dumplings. So hey, dumplings on Monday too!
Ok. Can't wait! Thank you for hosting. I know I was the one to ask for the Bulgogi.
Oh no! It was long overdue anyways.
It just sucks that I will have work the next day. But oh well. I'm gonna stuff my face and be happy. Haha.
I know!!! I'm so sorry. You can leave whenever you want. I have work the next day too, so we're in the same boat!
It's all good. We'll make the best of it.
Yes we will!!!! It'll be awesome!
